category.name: Workflow
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: SIGNOFF_required_group_and_role
preference.preference_description: Setting for SIGNOFF_required_group_and_role 0--> User must be a registered member of the signoff required group and role, but doesn't have to be logged in as a member of that group or role to perform the signoff. (Default) 1--> User must be a registered member of the signoff required group and role, and must be currently logged in as a member of that group or role to perform the signoff.
